training_examples.input:
SOFTWARE LICENSE AGREEMENT
Contract Number: SLA-2024-001
Date: January 15, 2024

PARTIES:
Vendor: TechSolutions Inc.
Address: 123 Innovation Drive, Tech City, CA 90210
Email: contracts@techsolutions.com
Phone: (555) 123-4567

Client: Business Corp
Address: 456 Corporate Blvd, Business City, NY 10001
Contact: John Smith, Procurement Manager
Email: john.smith@businesscorp.com
Phone: (555) 987-6543

CONTRACT VALUE: $75,000 annually
Currency: USD
Payment Schedule: Annual payment in advance

PAYMENT TERMS: Net 30 days from invoice date
All invoices must be submitted by the 25th of each month.
Late payment penalty: 1.5% per month on outstanding amounts.

DELIVERY TERMS: Standard delivery within 5-7 business days
Software deployment and training included.
Support: 24/7 technical support included.

COMPLIANCE: This agreement complies with all industry standards and 
includes required data protection clauses per GDPR requirements.
All software meets SOC 2 Type II compliance standards.

TERMINATION: Either party may terminate with 90 days written notice.
Upon termination, client retains limited license for 30 days for data migration.

GOVERNING LAW: This agreement shall be governed by the laws of California.
Any disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration in Los Angeles, CA.

compliance_requirements.extracted_text: This agreement complies with all industry standards and includes required data protection clauses per GDPR requirements. All software meets SOC 2 Type II compliance standards.

training_examples.input:
URGENT: RUSH DELIVERY CONTRACT
Contract ID: RUSH-2024-002
Date: February 20, 2024

PRIORITY: HIGH - IMMEDIATE ATTENTION REQUIRED

This is a high-priority contract requiring immediate attention and processing.

PAYMENT TERMS: Payment due within 120 days of project completion
with a 5% early payment discount if paid within 10 days. 
Special arrangement negotiated for this preferred vendor client
due to their long-standing relationship and credit history.

CONTRACT VALUE: $2,500,000 (Two Million Five Hundred Thousand USD)
This represents a significant enterprise engagement requiring
executive approval and additional oversight.

DELIVERY TERMS: RUSH DELIVERY - All components must be delivered
within 24 hours of order confirmation. Expedited shipping required.
Special handling fees apply for rush orders.

COMPLIANCE NOTE: This contract is missing standard compliance
clauses and requires legal review before execution.
Data protection requirements need to be added.
Insurance requirements are not specified.

CONTACT INFORMATION:
Primary: Sarah Wilson, VP Operations
Email: urgent@company.com
Phone: 555-URGENT (555-874-3689)
Mobile: (555) 999-1234

Secondary: Mike Chen, Legal Counsel
Email: legal@company.com
Phone: (555) 555-0199

GOVERNING LAW: New York State
TERMINATION: Immediate termination allowed for non-performance

payment_terms.extracted_text: Payment due within 120 days of project completion with a 5% early payment discount if paid within 10 days

delivery_terms.extracted_text: RUSH DELIVERY - All components must be delivered within 24 hours of order confirmation. Expedited shipping required.

compliance_requirements.extracted_text: This contract is missing standard compliance clauses and requires legal review before execution. Data protection requirements need to be added. Insurance requirements are not specified.

training_examples.input:
CONSULTING AGREEMENT
Contract Number: CONS-2024-003
Date: March 10, 2024

This agreement outlines consulting services for business process optimization.

PARTIES:
Consultant: Strategic Solutions LLC
Client: Mid-Size Corp

PAYMENT ARRANGEMENT: Payment will be arranged separately through
our finance department. Terms to be negotiated based on project scope.
Hourly rates apply for additional work beyond base scope.

CONTRACT VALUE: To be determined based on final scope
Estimated range: $25,000 - $50,000

SERVICES: Strategic consulting and process improvement
Deliverables include analysis report and implementation roadmap.

DELIVERY: Services will be delivered as needed over 6-month period.
No specific delivery timeline established.

COMPLIANCE: Standard business practices apply.
No specific regulatory requirements identified.

CONTACT: For questions, please contact our office.
Main office: (555) 123-0000
Project inquiries: consulting@strategic.com

TERMS: This is a preliminary agreement.
Final terms subject to negotiation and formal contract execution.

payment_terms.extracted_text: Payment will be arranged separately through our finance department. Terms to be negotiated based on project scope.

contract_value.extracted_text: To be determined based on final scope. Estimated range: $25,000 - $50,000

delivery_terms.extracted_text: Services will be delivered as needed over 6-month period. No specific delivery timeline established.

compliance_requirements.extracted_text: Standard business practices apply. No specific regulatory requirements identified.

PROFESSIONAL SERVICES AGREEMENT
        Contract Number: PSA-2024-004
        Date: August 20, 2025
        
        CONSULTING SERVICES for Digital Transformation
        
        CLIENT: Innovation Corp
        VENDOR: Digital Solutions LLC
        Contact: Sarah Wilson, Project Manager
        Email: sarah@digitalsolutions.com
        Phone: (555) 888-9999
        
        CONTRACT VALUE: $125,000 for 6-month engagement
        Payment Schedule: Monthly payments of $20,833.33
        
        PAYMENT TERMS: Net 15 days from invoice date
        Monthly invoicing on the 1st of each month.
        
        DELIVERY: Services delivered remotely with weekly check-ins.
        Final deliverables due within 180 days of contract start.
        
        COMPLIANCE: Standard professional services agreement.
        Confidentiality and IP protection clauses included.
        
        This agreement requires client approval before execution.
